provider.transfer_message: We will transfer you to your provider.

account.title: Account
account.connect_message: To use this service, we need to access information from your accounts at Alinma Bank.
account.confirmation_text: Continue to Alinma Bank to share your account information under these terms?
account.success_message: Your account has been successfully connected!

faq.share_reason: Why do we need you to share?
faq.share_explanation: To provide you a one place to manage your accounts across all banks.
faq.account_details_explanation: Account name, number, and balance are required.
faq.regular_payments_explanation: Details of your standing orders, direct debits, and recurring payments.
faq.account_transactions_explanation: Details of your incoming and outgoing transactions.
faq.contact_details_explanation: Your full legal name, address, and contact details.

loadingMessage: We are securely transferring you to SAMA Model Bank
iban_verification_description: Quickly and reliably verify single or multiple IBANs.
ob_connect_description: Manage customer consent for Open Banking easily and build trust.
income_verification_description: Verify income details in minutes, more efficient processing.

aaaccount.success_message: Your account has been successfully connected.

account_support.message: If your account supports it, we will securely transfer you to your banking app to authenticate this connection.

single_api.title: Single Api
single_api.single_api_desc: The Single API allows seamless access to financial data through advanced user profile management and consent.

e_statements.title: E-statement
e_statements.subtitle: Where you can request your e-statements instantly
